snippet.title: Ryte: The Eye of Atlantis - Teaser Trailer [PC VR]
snippet.description:
Teaser trailer for Ryte: The Eye of Atlantis, a Myst-inspired virtual reality adventure game that transports you to the lost civilization of Atlantis. The game is being developed by Orichalcum Pictures and VR Connection, and will be released for PC VR this Winter. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/ryte-the-eye-of-atlantis

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com
